START.error_user_info: âŒ Cholakwika pakupanga zambiri za wogwiritsa ntchito.
START.error_user_data: âŒ Cholakwika pakuyambitsa deta ya wogwiritsa ntchito: {error}
START.error_critical:
âŒ Cholakwika chachikulu chinachitika: {error}
Chonde yesaninso kapena funsani thandizo.
START.error_send_welcome: âŒ Cholakwika pokutumiza uthenga wokondedwa. Chonde yesaninso kapena funsani thandizo.
START.getting_started_value:
â€¢ Gwiritsani ntchito `/daily` kuti mupeze mfundo tsiku lililonse
â€¢ Yesani `/texttr` kuti mumalize kumasulira koyamba
â€¢ Yang'anani `/shop` kuti muwone zosintha zamakono
â€¢ Gwiritsani `/help` kuti muwone malamulo onse
START.admin_tips_value:
â€¢ Gwiritsani `/setchannel` kusintha mindandanda ya njira kapena zilankhulo
â€¢ Gwiritsani `/invite` kuwonjezera Muse m'maseva ena
â€¢ Gwiritsani `/help` kuwona malamulo onse
START.daily_claimed_value: Bwererani mawa kuti mupeze mfundo zambiri!
START.voice_commands_value:
`/voicechat [source] [target]` - Mawu omasulira munthawi yeniyeni
`/voicechat2 [lang1] [lang2]` - Omasulira awiri mbali othandizidwa
`/voice [text] [source] [target]` - Kusintha mawu kukhala mawu
`/speak [text] [source] [target]` - Kumasulira ndi kusewera mu njira ya mawu
START.text_commands_value:
`/texttr [text] [source] [target]` - Kumasulira malemba
`/autotranslate [source] [target]` - Kumasulira mauthenga anu onse
`/read [message_id] [target]` - Kumasulira uthenga uliwonse womwe watumizidwa
`/dmtr [user] [text] [source] [target]` - Kutumiza DM womasulira
START.achievements_value:
`/achievements` - Onani momwe mukukwaniritsa
`/rewards` - Onani mfundo ndi mlingo wanu
`/cashout` - Sungani mfundo zochitika kukhala mfundo zogwira ntchito
`/daily` - Pezani mfundo tsiku lililonse
`/shop` - Sakatulani shopu ya mfundo
`/buy [item]` - Gula zinthu mu shopu
`/buypoints [amount]` - Gulani mfundo zowonjezera
`/gift [amount]` - Pepani anzanu mfundo
`/profile` - Onani mbiri yanu
`/leaderboard` - Onani ogwiritsa ntchito apamwamba
`/transactions` - Onani mbiri ya malipiro
START.settings_value:
`/hide` kapena `/show` - Sungani kapena onetsani malemba oyambirira
`/preferences` - Sinthani zokonda zilankhulo
`/history` - Onani mbiri ya kumasulira
`/list` - Onani zilankhulo zonse zomwe zikugwirizana
`/upgrade` - Lowetsani zinthu zapamwamba
`/help` - Mndandanda wamalamulo onse
`/stop` - Imbani ntchito yomasulira
START.community_value:
`/feedback` - Funsa Muse ndikupeza mfundo!
`/reviews` - Onani malingaliro a ena
`/invite` - Tumizani Muse kwa anzanu (peza mfundo!)
`/vote` - Thandizani bot pamalumikizidwe a bot (peza mfundo!)
START.upgrade_benefits_value:
ğŸ¥‰ **Basic ($1/mwezi):** 500 zilembo, 1h mawu, kupeza mbiri
ğŸ¥ˆ **Premium ($3/mwezi):** 2000 zilembo, 2h mawu, kusintha mwachangu
ğŸ¥‡ **Pro ($5/mwezi):** Palibe malire + zinthu zamayeso
START.premium_active_value:
â€¢ Malire otsogola: {text_limit} zilembo
â€¢ Nthawi ya mawu: {voice_limit} mphindi
â€¢ Kuchulukitsa mfundo: {multiplier}
â€¢ Tikuthokoza kuthandiza Muse! ğŸ’–
START.language_format_value:
Mutha kugwiritsa ntchito mayina kapena makodi a zilankhulo:
â€¢ Mayina: `Chingerezi`, `Chisipanishi`, `Chijapani`
â€¢ Makodi: `en`, `es`, `ja`
â€¢ Mwachitsanzo: `/texttr text:'Hello World' source_lang:English target_lang:Spanish`

START.footer_dm: Njira ya Wogwiritsa Ntchito: Oyenera ma DM | Lowani seva yathu yothandizira: discord.gg/VMpBsbhrff

HELP.title: ğŸ¤– Muse Translator - Mndandanda wa Malamulo
HELP.description: Awa ndi malamulo onse omwe akupezeka:
HELP.reward_value:
`/daily` - Pezani mphotho ya tsiku ndi tsiku
`/shop` - Onani sitolo ya mphotho
`/buy [reward]` - Gulani mphotho ndi ma points
`/profile [user]` - Onani mbiri ndi ziwerengero
`/rewards` - Onani mphotho zomwe zikuyenda
`/gift [user] [amount]` - Perekani ma points kwa ena
HELP.social_value:
`/leaderboard` - Onani ogwiritsa ntchito apamwamba pa ma points
`/achievements` - Onani zibwano ndi mphotho zanu
`/cashout` - Sandutsani ma achievement points kuti mugwiritse ntchito mu `/shop`
`/transactions` - Onani mbiri ya ma transaction a points
HELP.setup_value_user:
`/start` - Yambitsani translator
`/stop` - Yimitsani ma session a translation
HELP.setup_value_admin:
`/start` - Yambitsani translator
`/setchannel [channel_id]` - Khazikitsani channel ya translation
`/stop` - Yimitsani ma session a translation
HELP.settings_value:
`/hide` - Bisani zolemba zoyambirira mu translation
`/show` - Onetsani zolemba zoyambirira mu translation
`/preferences` - Sinthani zilankhulo zomwe mumakonda
`/history` - Onani mbiri ya ma translation
HELP.info_value:
`/list` - Onetsani zilankhulo zonse zothandizidwa
`/upgrade` - Pezani zambiri za premium
`/invite` - Pezani ma link a bot
`/vote` - Pezani ma link a bot listings
`/help` - Onetsani mndandanda wa malamulo awa
HELP.context_value: `Dinani uthenga ndi right-click` â†’ `Apps` â†’ `Read Message` - Tembenuzani uthenga uliwonse
HELP.tips_value:
â€¢ Gwiritsani ntchito `auto` monga source language kuti muzindikire zokha
â€¢ Makhodi a chilankhulo: `en`, `es`, `fr` kapena maina: `English`, `Spanish`, `French`
â€¢ Pezani ma points tsiku ndi tsiku ndikugula premium yokhazikika!
â€¢ Chitsanzo: `/texttr text:'Hello' source_lang:en target_lang:es`
HELP.footer_server: Server Mode: {server} | Mawonekedwe onse alipo | Gwiritsani ntchito /daily kuti mulandire ma points!
HELP.footer_dm: User Mode: Zabwino pa ma DM | Mawonekedwe ena a server-only | Gwiritsani ntchito /daily kuti mulandire ma points!

4. **Ikani ID** mu lamulo ili
